name: Amigos de Presidio Heights
description: Amigos Presidio Heights preschool offers a nurturing, fun, and developmentally appropriate Spanish immersion environment for children ages 2-5 years old. This is a year-round, full-day art-based preschool offering full and part-time schedules.
fullDescription: Amigos Presidio Heights preschool offers a nurturing, fun, and developmentally appropriate Spanish immersion environment for children ages 2-5 years old. This is a year-round, full-day art-based preschool offering full and part-time schedules.
